metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8341 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in Jinja2 2.10. The from_stringfunction is prone to Server Side Template Injection (SSTI) where it takesthe "source" parameter as a template object, renders it, and then returnsit. The attacker can exploit it with {{INJECTION COMMANDS}} in a URI. NOTE:The maintainer and multiple third parties believe that this vulnerabilityisn't valid because users shouldn't use untrusted templates withoutsandboxing.

criterions.comment: jinja2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
